sentences.sContent: the elementary principles of justice and democracy
sentences.sCn: 正义和民主的基本信条

sentences.sContent: You’ve made a very elementary mistake.
sentences.sCn: 你犯了一个非常基本的错误。

sentences.sContent: I’m only familiar with the subject at an elementary level.
sentences.sCn: 我对这门学科的了解只是初级水平。

sentences.sContent: ...It's not about making money for this former elementary school teacher...
...we should make full use of those elementary skills...

...The pervasive undervaluation on elementary skills that we find among current students and even some teachers can largely be attributed to their lack of vision of future and thorough understanding on the knowledge...
...It is worth mentioning that those seemingly basic and elementary skills we learned in school actually play a significantly indispensable role in our future works...
...where she was assigned to the district’s toughest elementary school...
...so she switched to a highly regarded charger elementary school in the Bay Area where she poured her energy into her job and it showed...

synos.tran: 基本的；初级的；[化学]元素的

phrases.pCn: n. 初等教育，基本教育（指小学）

words.tran: 基本的；主要的；自然力的；四大要素的（土、水、气、火）
元素；要素；原理；成分；自然环境
